Package me.m64diamondstar.dialoguemaster.api.utils

Interface DMMessageUtils

public interface DMMessageUtils
This class is used to send messages to players. You can for example send prefixed messages with this. Please use the DialogueMasterAPI.getMessageUtils() method to get the message utils.
